thread.title: Tacoma sees sharp decline in burglaries
thread.title_full: Tacoma sees sharp decline in burglaries | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Tacoma sees sharp decline in burglaries
text:
Tacoma is apparently safer this year. Even police say they are surprised by a sharp decline in burglaries.
The News Tribune reports that law enforcement hoped to reduce burglaries by 7.5 percent this year and next year.
Currently, residential burglaries are down 22 percent in Tacoma and commercial break-ins are down 8 percent.
Statewide, Tacoma still has the highest number of property crimes per capita.
Seattle has the second highest.
